committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit the establishment and collection of any fee or charge for the inspection of sailing school vessels.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to Coast Guard user fees to prohibit any fee for inspection of a sailing school vessel under provisions relating to inspection and regulation of vessels.

titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit the establishment and collection of any fee or charge for the inspection of sailing school vessels.
